DC 20549</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="5" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;">QUARTERLY REPORT</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;">PURSUANT TO SECTION 13 or 15(d)</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;">OF THE SECURITIES EXCHANGE ACT OF 1934</font></b></p>

file number)</font></b></p>

that the registrant was required to file such reports), and (2) has been

large accelerated filer, an accelerated filer, or a non-accelerated filer. See
definition of &#147;filer and large accelerated filer&#148; in Rule 12b-2 of the Exchange
Act. (Check one):</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Part I - Financial Information</font></b><a name="PartIFinancialInformation_131216"></a></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ITEM
1</font></b>. <b>Consolidated Financial
Statements</b><a name="Item1_ConsolidatedFinancialStatem_131221"></a></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">INTERNATIONAL
BUSINESS MACHINES CORPORATION</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">AND
SUBSIDIARY COMPANIES</font></b></p>

  <td width="7" style="border:none;"></td>

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Reclassified
to conform with 2006 presentation; see Note 1 on page 6 for additional
information.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>(Amounts
may not add due to rounding.)</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>(The accompanying notes are
an integral part of the financial statements.)</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">1</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

to rounding.)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(The accompanying notes
are an integral part of the financial statements.)</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">2</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\fc\303185948277_D11238_1443045\19062-7-fa.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 19:00 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>


<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">INTERNATIONAL
BUSINESS MACHINES CORPORATION</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">AND
SUBSIDIARY COMPANIES</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">CONSOLIDATED STATEMENT OF FINANCIAL POSITION</font></b><a name="ConsolidatedStatementOfFinancialP_131249"></a></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(UNAUDITED)</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ASSETS</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="71%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:71.08%;">

to rounding.)</font></p>

are an integral part of the financial statements.)</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">INTERNATIONAL
BUSINESS MACHINES CORPORATION</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">AND
SUBSIDIARY COMPANIES</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">CONSOLIDATED STATEMENT OF CASH FLOWS</font></b><a name="ConsolidatedStatementOfCashFlows_131300"></a></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Reclassified
to conform with 2006 presentation.</p>

are an integral part of the financial statements.)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">5</font></p>
</div><br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\fc\303185948277_D11238_1443045\19062-7-fa.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 19:00 2006' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

<div>
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Notes
to Consolidated Financial Statements</font></b><a name="NotesToConsolidatedFinancialState_131340"></a></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The accompanying consolidated financial
statements and notes thereto are unaudited.&#160;
In the opinion of the management of International Business Machines
Corporation (the company), these statements include all adjustments, which are
of a normal recurring nature, necessary to present a fair statement of the
company&#146;s results of operations, financial position and cash flows.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The preparation of
financial statements in conformity with accounting principles generally
accepted in the United States of America (GAAP) requires management to make
estimates and assumptions that affect the amounts of assets, liabilities,
revenue and expenses that are reported in the Consolidated Financial Statements
and accompanying disclosures.&#160; Actual
results may be different.&#160; See the
company&#146;s 2005 Annual Report for a discussion of the company&#146;s critical
accounting estimates.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Interim results
are not necessarily indicative of results for a full year.&#160; The information included in this Form 10-Q
should be read in conjunction with the company&#146;s 2005 Annual Report.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the first
quarter of 2006, the company made changes to its management system.&#160; These changes impacted the company&#146;s
reportable segments and resulted in the reclassification of certain revenue and
cost within its Consolidated Statement of Earnings.&#160; These changes did not impact the company&#146;s
total revenue, cost, expense, net income, earnings per share, Consolidated
Statement of Financial Position or Consolidated Statement of Cash Flows.&#160; See Note 10 for additional information
regarding the changes in reportable segments.&#160;
The periods presented in this Form 10-Q are reported on a comparable
basis.&#160; The company filed a Form 8-K with
the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) on June 13, 2006 to reclassify its
historical financial statements and related footnotes to reflect these
management system changes.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Within the
financial tables in this Form 10-Q, certain columns and rows may not add due to
the use of rounded numbers for disclosure purposes.&#160; Percentages presented are calculated from the
underlying whole-dollar amounts.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">6</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.94%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4,597</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="0%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:.82%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Effective January 1, 2005, the company
adopted the provisions of Statement of Financial Accounting Standards (SFAS)
No. 123(R), &#147;Share-Based Payment.&#148;&#160;
Accordingly, stock-based compensation expense is measured at grant date,
based on the fair value of the award and is recognized as expense over the
employee requisite service period.&#160; The
following table presents total stock-based compensation expense included in the
Consolidated Statement of Earnings:</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">

  <td width="62%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:62.62%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Pre-tax
  stock-based compensation expense</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:6.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">212</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:6.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">251</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:6.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">621</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:6.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">788</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="0%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:.82%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">

  benefits</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(75</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0.375pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(87</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0.375pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>

 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="62%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:62.62%;">

  compensation expense</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">137</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>

  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">164</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">401</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">519</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="0%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:.82%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

</table>

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:5.0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Includes $3 million and $7 million
of credits in the three- and nine-month periods ended September 30, 2005,
respectively, as a result of awards forfeited in connection with the company&#146;s
second-quarter 2005 workforce resource actions.</p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The reduction in pre-tax stock-based compensation expense for the three
and nine-month periods ended September 30, 2006, as compared to the
corresponding periods in the prior year, was principally the result of: (1) a
reduction in the level and fair value of stock option grants ($74 million and
$231 million, respectively), (2) changes to the terms of the company&#146;s employee
stock purchase plan, which rendered it non-compensatory in the second quarter
of 2005 in accordance with the provisions of SFAS 123(R) (no effect in
three-month period and $18 million decrease in nine-month period), offset by
(3) increased expense for performance-based stock</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">7</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='7',FILE='C:\fc\303195537756_D11240_1443171\19062-7-fi.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 19:55 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">units ($3 million and $30
million, respectively) resulting from changes in the probabilities of achieving
performance metrics and (4) an increase in the level of restricted equity award
grants ($32 million and $52 million, respectively).&#160; The effects on pre-tax stock-based compensation
expense of the 2005 sale of the Personal Computing business were recorded in
Other (income) and expense above and in the Consolidated Statement of Earnings
for the nine-month period ended September 30, 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As
of September 30, 2006, $1,330 million of total unrecognized compensation
expense related to non-vested awards is expected to be recognized over a
weighted average period of approximately 2 years.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">There
were no significant capitalized stock-based compensation expense at September
30, 2006 and 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Under IBM&#146;s
long-standing practices and policies, all stock option awards are approved
prior to or on the date of grant.&#160; The
exercise price of at-the-money stock options is the average of the high and low
market price on the date of grant or, in the case of premium-priced stock
options, 10 percent above such average.&#160;
The options approval process specifies the individual receiving the
grant, the number of options or the value of the award, the exercise price or
formula for determining the exercise price and the date of grant.&#160; All option awards for senior management are
approved by the Executive Compensation and Management Resources Committee of
the Board of Directors (the &#147;Committee&#148;).&#160;
All option awards for employees other than senior management are
approved by senior management pursuant to a series of delegations that were
approved by the Committee, and the grants made pursuant to these delegations
are reviewed periodically with the Committee. Options that are awarded as part
of annual total compensation for senior management and other employees are made
on specific cycle dates scheduled in advance. With respect to option awards
given in connection with promotions or new hires, IBM&#146;s policy requires
approval of such awards prior to the grant date, which is typically the date of
the promotion or the date of hire.&#160; The
exercise price of these options is the average of the high and low market price
on the date of grant in the case of at-the-money stock options or, in the case
of premium-priced stock options, 10 percent above such average.&#160; See IBM&#146;s 2005 Annual Report, note U, &#147;Stock-Based
Compensation&#148;, for additional information on the company&#146;s stock-based
incentive awards.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; In September 2006, the Financial
Accounting Standards Board (FASB) released SFAS No. 158, &#147;Employers&#146; Accounting
for Defined Benefit Pension and Other Postretirement Plans&#148; that requires
employers to recognize the funded status of their postretirement plans in the
statement of financial position and introduces additional net periodic benefit
cost disclosure requirements. The funded status is measured as the difference
between the fair value of plan assets and the benefit obligation. The company
will adopt SFAS No. 158 as of December 31, 2006. Upon adoption of SFAS No. 158,
the company will recognize the underfunded status of its defined benefit
pension plans and non-pension postretirement benefit plans as a liability in
its Consolidated Statement of Financial Position.&#160; The overfunded status of the company&#146;s
defined benefit pension plans will be recognized as an asset in its Consolidated
Statement of Financial Position. Gains or losses, prior service costs or
credits, and transition assets that have not yet been included in net periodic
benefit cost as of December 31, 2006, will be recognized, net of tax, as
components of the ending</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">8</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='8',FILE='C:\fc\303195537756_D11240_1443171\19062-7-fi.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 19:55 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">balance of Accumulated Gains and (Losses) not
Affecting Retained Earnings. Subsequent to adoption, the company will recognize
the gains or losses and prior service costs or credits, net of tax, that arise
during the period but are not recognized in net periodic benefit cost as a
component of Accumulated Gains and (Losses) not Affecting Retained
Earnings.&#160; Those amounts will be adjusted
as they are subsequently recognized in net periodic benefit cost. The company
measures defined benefit plan assets and obligations as of December 31 and SFAS
No. 158 will not affect the company&#146;s existing valuation practices.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The adoption of SFAS No. 158 as of December 31, 2006
is expected to reduce the company&#146;s assets between $11 - 12 billion, decrease
its liabilities between $0.5 - 1.5 billion, and reduce its stockholders&#146; equity
between $10 - 11 billion.&#160; The company&#146;s
Total stockholders&#146; equity was $34.2 billion at September 30, 2006.&#160; The company estimated the effect of adoption
based on the most current valuations of its significant pension and non-pension
postretirement benefit obligations at December 31, 2005, adjusted for the
remeasurement of certain non-U.S. benefit plans arising from plan amendments
and changes in certain significant assumptions at September 30, 2006.&#160; Those assumptions include the discount rate,
interest crediting rate, fair value of plan assets and foreign exchange
rates.&#160; The current estimate is based on
the expectation that deferred tax assets attributable to pension and
non-pension postretirement benefits will be realized.&#160; The actual effect of adoption could
materially differ from the estimate as a result of changes in assumptions used
in the valuation of plan obligations and fair value of plan assets.&#160; As noted above, those assumptions include,
but are not limited to, discount rates, interest crediting rates, actual fair
value of plan assets, foreign exchange rates, country-specific tax treatment,
and the realizability of deferred tax assets.&#160;
In addition, the company estimates that approximately $1.0 billion of
the liability balance will be reclassified as a current liability in accordance
with the provisions of SFAS 158.&#160; The
adoption of SFAS No. 158 will have no impact on the company&#146;s existing debt
covenants, credit ratings or financial flexibility.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In September 2006, the FASB finalized SFAS No. 157, &#147;Fair
Value Measurements&#148; which will become effective in 2008. This Statement defines
fair value, establishes a framework for measuring fair value, and expands
disclosures about fair value measurements; however, it does not require any new
fair value measurements. The provisions of SFAS No. 157 will be applied
prospectively to fair value measurements and disclosures in the company&#146;s
Consolidated Financial Statements beginning in the first quarter of 2008.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In September 2006, the SEC issued Staff Accounting
Bulletin (SAB) No. 108, codified as SAB Topic 1.N, &#147;Considering the Effects of
Prior Year Misstatements When Quantifying Misstatements in Current Year
Financial Statements.&#148; SAB No. 108 describes the approach that should be used
to quantify the materiality of a misstatement and provides guidance for
correcting prior year errors.&nbsp;&nbsp;  The company early adopted SAB No. 108 in
the third quarter of 2006 and accordingly, follows SAB No. 108 requirements
when quantifying financial statement misstatements. The adoption of SAB No. 108
did not result in corrections of the company&#146;s Consolidated Financial
Statements.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In July 2006, the
FASB released FASB Interpretation No. 48, &#147;Accounting for Uncertainty in Income
Taxes, an Interpretation of FASB Statement No. 109&#148; (FIN 48).&nbsp;&nbsp;  FIN 48
clarifies the accounting and reporting for uncertainties in income tax law.&nbsp;&nbsp;
This Interpretation prescribes a comprehensive model for the financial
statement recognition, measurement, presentation and disclosure of uncertain
tax positions taken or expected to be taken in income tax returns. The</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">9</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='9',FILE='C:\fc\303195537756_D11240_1443171\19062-7-fi.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 19:55 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">company will adopt this Interpretation in the first
quarter of 2007.&nbsp;&nbsp;  The cumulative effects, if any, of applying this
Interpretation will be recorded as an adjustment to Retained earnings,
Goodwill, or Accumulated Gains and (Losses) not Affecting Retained Earnings, as
appropriate, as of the beginning of the period of adoption.&nbsp;&nbsp;  The company
has commenced the process of evaluating the expected effect of FIN 48 on its
Consolidated Financial Statements and does not presently expect a material
impact upon adoption.&#160; However, the company
does expect to reclassify a portion of its unrecognized tax benefits from
current to non-current liabilities because payment of cash is not anticipated
within one year of the balance sheet date. Prior period amounts also will be
reclassified to conform to this change in presentation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; In May 2005, the company implemented a
series of restructuring actions designed to improve the company&#146;s efficiencies,
strengthen its client-facing operations and capture opportunities in
high-growth markets. The company&#146;s actions primarily included voluntary and
involuntary workforce reductions, with the majority impacting the Global
Services business, primarily in Europe, as well as the vacating of leased
facilities. These actions were in addition to the company&#146;s ongoing workforce
reduction and rebalancing activities that occur each quarter.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The total charges
expected to be incurred in connection with all second-quarter 2005 initiatives
are approximately $1,766 million, of which $1,753 million has been recorded
cumulatively through September 30, 2006. The remaining expected charges
represent accretion/interest expense on the long-term portion of the company&#146;s
workforce and vacant space obligations. Approximately $1,623 million of the
total charges require cash payments, of which approximately $1,344 million has
been made as of September 30, 2006 and $75 million are expected to be made over
the next 12 months.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">10</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='10',FILE='C:\fc\303195537756_D11240_1443171\19062-7-fi.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 19:55 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Total pre-tax restructuring activity was as follows:</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="8%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:8.94%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(5</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="8%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:8.94%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">83</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">

  </td>

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 2.25pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font></p>
  </td>

</table>

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:5.0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>$1.6
billion recorded in Selling, general and administrative expense and $0.2
billion recorded in Other (income) and expense in the Consolidated Statement of
Earnings.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:5.0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Consists
of foreign currency translation adjustments ($38 million), net
reclassifications to other balance sheet categories ($41 million) and reversals
of previously recorded liabilities ($34 million) for changes in the estimated
cost of employee terminations and vacant space, offset by approximately $1 million
of accretion expense. The reversals were recorded primarily in SG&amp;A expense.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:5.0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>$391
million recorded as a current liability in Accounts payable and accruals and
$146 million as a non-current liability in Other liabilities in the
Consolidated Statement of Financial Position.</p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

</table>

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:5.0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(4)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Consists
of foreign currency translation adjustments ($27 million), net balance sheet
reclassifications ($2 million) and accretion expense ($5 million), offset by
reversals of previous recorded liabilities ($27 million) for changes in the
estimated cost of employee terminations and vacant space.&#160; These reversals were primarily recorded in
SG&amp;A.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:5.0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(5)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>$75
million recorded as a current liability in Accounts payable and accruals and
$192 million as a non-current liability in Other liabilities in the
Consolidated Statement of Financial Position.</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">11</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='11',FILE='C:\fc\303195537756_D11240_1443171\19062-7-fi.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 19:55 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Charges incurred
for the workforce reductions consisted of severance/termination benefits for
approximately 16,000 employees (14,500 of which were for the incremental
second-quarter 2005 actions).&#160; All
separations were substantially completed by March 31, 2006.&#160; The non-current portion of the liability
associated with the workforce reductions relates to terminated employees who
were granted annual payments to supplement their income in certain countries.
Depending on individual country legal requirements, these required payments
will continue until the former employee begins receiving pension benefits or is
deceased. Cash payments made through September 30, 2006 associated with the
workforce reductions were $1,259 million.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The vacant space
accruals are primarily for ongoing obligations to pay rent for vacant space,
offset by estimated sublease income, over the respective lease term of the
company&#146;s lease agreements. The length of these obligations varies by lease
with the longest extending through 2019.</font></p>

<p style="margin:5.0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In connection with the
company&#146;s restructuring activities initiated in the second quarter of 2005, the
company recorded pre-tax impairment charges for certain real estate assets of
approximately $95 million during the year ended December 31, 2005. The
principal component of such impairment charges resulted from the sale of a
facility in Yasu-City, Japan, which closed during the third quarter of 2005. In
connection with this sale, the company recorded an impairment charge to write
the asset down to its fair value in the second quarter of 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">These
restructuring activities had the following effect on the company&#146;s reportable
segments:</font></p>

<div align="center" style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="288" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:216.05pt;">
  <p align="left" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><!-- SET mrlHTMLTableCenter -->At&nbsp;September&nbsp;30,&nbsp;2006:<br>
  (Dollars&nbsp;in&nbsp;millions)</p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="68" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:50.95pt;">

  Charges<br>

  for&nbsp;2Q&nbsp;2005<br>

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:5.0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Amounts
reclassified from previously reported amounts to reflect the new management
system structure implemented in the first quarter of 2006; see Note 10 for
additional information.</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">12</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='12',FILE='C:\fc\303195537756_D11240_1443171\19062-7-fi.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 19:55 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The company offers defined benefit pension
plans, defined contribution pension plans, as well as nonpension postretirement
benefit plans primarily consisting of retiree medical benefits.&#160; The following tables provide the total
retirement-related benefit plans&#146; impact on income from continuing operations
before income taxes.</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="70%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:70.8%;">
  <p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:6.74%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:6.74%;">

 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">13</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='13',FILE='C:\fc\303195537756_D11240_1443171\19062-7-fi.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 19:55 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The following tables
provides the components of the cost/(income) for the company&#146;s pension plans:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Cost/(Income) of Pension Plans</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="67%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:67.48%;">
  <p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12%" colspan="5" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.76%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;">U.S.&nbsp;Plans</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12%" colspan="5" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.6%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;">Non-U.S.&nbsp;Plans</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="67%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:67.48%;">
  <p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;">(Dollars&nbsp;in&nbsp;millions)</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">

  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">231</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="4%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:4.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">142</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="4%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:4.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">267</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="4%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:4.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">287</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:5.0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Represents
the qualified portion of the IBM Personal Pension Plan.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:5.0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">**</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Represents
the qualified and non-qualified portion of material non-U.S. plans.</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">14</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Represents
the qualified portion of the IBM Personal Pension Plan.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">**</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Represents
the qualified and non-qualified portion of material non-U.S. plans.</p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In 2006, the
company expects to contribute between $1.7 - $2 billion to its non-U.S. defined
benefit plans.&#160; The legally mandated
minimum contribution&#160; included in the
amount above for the company&#146;s non-U.S. plans is expected to be approximately
$895 million.&#160; In the first nine months
of 2006, the company contributed $1,676 million to its non-U.S. plans.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">15</font></p>
</div><br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='15',FILE='C:\fc\303195537756_D11240_1443171\19062-7-fi.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 19:55 2006' -->

<div>
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

provides the components of the cost for the company&#146;s nonpension postretirement
benefits:</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">97</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">95</font></p>

  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">290</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">279</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="0%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:.4%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

</table>

<p style="line-height:1.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The
Medicare Prescription Drug Improvement and Modernization Act of 2003 did not
have a material impact on the company&#146;s Consolidated Financial Statements as of
or for the periods ended September 30, 2006.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The changes in the
carrying amount of goodwill, by reportable segment, for the nine months ended
September 30, 2006, are as follows:</font></p>

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">*</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b>Amounts
reclassified from previously reported amounts reflect the new management system
structure implemented in the first quarter of 2006; see Note 10 for additional
information.</p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">There were no goodwill
impairment losses recorded during the quarter.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">16</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

schedule details the company&#146;s intangible asset balances by major asset class:</font></p>

  </td>

  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:10.24%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3,452</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.88%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:10.24%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1,789</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 1.125pt 0pt;width:1.88%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1,663</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="0%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:.34%;">

  </td>

</table>

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Other
intangibles are primarily acquired proprietary and non-proprietary business
processes, methodologies and systems.</p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The net carrying
amount of intangible assets decreased $64 million during the first nine months
of 2006 due to amortization of existing intangible asset balances partially
offset by additions due to acquisitions.&#160;&#160;
The aggregate intangible asset amortization expense was $259 million and
$790 million for the third quarter and first nine months of 2006, respectively,
versus $266 million and $775 million for the third quarter and first nine
months of 2005, respectively.&#160; The
aggregate intangible asset amortization expense related to acquired intangible
assets was $66 million and $225 million for the third quarter and first nine
months of 2006, respectively, versus $95 million and $281 million for the
comparable prior year periods.&#160; In
addition, in the first nine months of 2006, the company retired $964 million of
fully amortized intangible assets, impacting both the gross carrying amount and
accumulated amortization for this amount.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The amortization
expense for each of the five succeeding years relating to intangible assets
currently recorded in the Consolidated Statement of Financial Position is
estimated to be the following at September 30, 2006:</font></p>

<div align="center" style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">17</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='17',FILE='C:\fc\3049180533_F25892_1444952\19062-7-fk.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 31 09:18 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; During the nine months
ended September 30, 2006, the company completed nine acquisitions at an
aggregate cost of $1,042 million.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Software segment
completed seven acquisitions: in the first quarter, Micromuse, a publicly
traded company; Cims Lab, a privately held company; and Language Analysis
Systems, Inc., a privately held company; in the second quarter, Buildforge, a
privately held company; Unicorn Solutions, Inc., a privately held company; and
Rembo Technology, a privately held company; and, in the third quarter, Webify
Solutions, a privately held company.&#160;
Each acquisition further complemented and enhanced the company&#146;s
portfolio of software product offerings.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Global Technology
Services (GTS) completed one acquisition in the first quarter: Viacore, Inc., a
privately held company.&#160; This acquisition
augments GTS&#146;s supply chain optimization practice within its Business
Transformation Outsourcing offerings.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Global Business Systems
(GBS) completed one acquisition in the third quarter: Valchemy, Inc., a
privately held company.&#160; This acquisition
will enhance the company&#146;s Business Consulting Services offerings.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Purchase price
consideration was paid all in cash.&#160;
These acquisitions are reported in the Consolidated Statement of Cash
Flows net of acquired cash and cash equivalents.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The table below reflects
the purchase price related to these acquisitions and the resulting purchase
price allocations as of September 30, 2006.&#160;
The Micromuse acquisition is shown separately given its significant
purchase price.</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.36%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="0%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:.98%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.36%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">201</font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.36%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
