  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(9.2</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0.375pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.92%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(9.4</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0.375pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="47%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:47.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Total</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">

  </td>
  <td width="8%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:8.94%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">22,617</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.92%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;">Percent</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">

  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.92%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;">for</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Reclassified
to conform with 2006 presentation.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">**</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
majority of the company&#146;s enterprise business, which excludes the company&#146;s
original equipment manufacturer (OEM) technology business, occurs in industries
that are broadly grouped into six sectors around which&#160; the company&#146;s sales and distribution
activities, as well as an increasing number of its services and products
businesses are organized. The majority of the businesses in the Small &amp;
Medium category have fewer than 1,000 employees.</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">32</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='32',FILE='C:\fc\3031881638_D12364_1442975\19062-7-ga.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 18:08 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="47%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:47.38%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>

  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="8%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:8.94%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">21,529</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.92%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.1</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 2.25pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.92%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.7</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 2.25pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="47%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:47.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Total</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="8%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:8.92%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">65,166</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="8%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:8.92%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">66,707</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.92%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2.3</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 2.25pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.92%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1.6</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 2.25pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:28.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On April 30, 2005,
the company sold its Personal Computing business.&#160; Accordingly, the company&#146;s reported revenue
results for the third quarter of 2006 and 2005, respectively, do not include
any Personal Computer revenue.&#160; The first
nine months of 2005 includes Personal Computer revenue for four months, while
the first nine months of&#160; 2006 does not
include any Personal Computer revenue.&#160;
The company has presented a discussion on changes in reported revenues
along with a&#160; discussion of revenue
results excluding the divested Personal Computing business.&#160; The company&#160;
believes that a more appropriate discussion is one that excludes the
revenue results from the Personal Computing&#160;
business from the first nine months of 2005 because it presents the
results on a comparable&#160; basis and
provides a more meaningful discussion which focuses on the company&#146;s ongoing
operational performance.&#160; Such discussion
is presented starting on page 36.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:28.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As-reported
revenue from all industry sectors and Small and Medium Business increased in
the third quarter of 2006 when compared to the same three months of 2005.&#160; The Financial Services Sector revenue
increase was driven by Banking (10.0 percent) and Financial Markets (11.5
percent).&#160; The Public Sector had growth
in Government (2.7 percent) that was largely offset by a decline in Education
(17.0 percent). Revenue growth in the Industrial Sector was driven by Chemical
and Petroleum (18.2 percent) and Automotive (4.6 percent) while Industrial
Products and Aerospace declined 12.4 percent and 7.9 percent,
respectively.&#160; The Distribution Sector,
while essentially flat, had revenue increases in the&#160; Retail Industry (3.4 percent) that was
largely offset by declining revenue in Consumer Products&#160; (5.4 percent). All industry units within the</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">33</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='33',FILE='C:\fc\3031881638_D12364_1442975\19062-7-ga.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 18:08 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Communications Sector
experienced revenue growth led by Telecommunications (7.4 percent) and
Utilities (16.6 percent). Revenue from Small and Medium Business increased 6.7
percent in the third quarter of 2006 when compared to the third quarter of 2005
with increases across all geographic markets.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:28.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As-reported
revenue for the first nine months of 2006 declined in all industry sectors,
with the exception of Financial Services and Communications,&#160; primarily due to the divestiture of the
Personal Computing business.&#160; The
Financial Services Sector revenue increase was driven by Banking (5.6
percent).&#160; The decrease in Public Sector
revenue was driven by Government (5.1 percent) and Education (28.6
percent).&#160; The Industrial Sector revenue
decline was driven by Automotive (5.6 percent), Industrial Products (12.9
percent) and Electronics (3.1 percent). The decline in Distribution Sector
revenue was driven by Travel and Transportation (6.5 percent) and Retail (2.1
percent).&#160; Communications Sector
revenue&#160; was unchanged with increased
revenue in Utilities (5.7 percent) being offset by declines in Media and
Entertainment (4.6 percent) and Telecommunications (0.4 percent).&#160; Revenue from Small and Medium Business
declined in all geographic markets, with a double digit decline in the Asia
Pacific geography.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:28.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Geographic revenue
performance, presented below and in the tables on page 33, exclude OEM revenue,
which is presented separately.&#160;
Country-specific and regional growth rates include OEM revenue.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:28.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Revenue growth
increased in all geographic markets in the third quarter of 2006 when compared
to the third quarter of 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:28.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Revenue in the
Americas geography increased&#160; 2.8 percent
(1.8 percent adjusted for currency) versus the third quarter of 2005.&#160; By region, Latin America increased 16.6
percent (12.4 percent adjusted for currency), Canada was up 5.0 percent (down
1.8 percent adjusted for currency) and the U.S. increased 3.6 percent, driven
by strong OEM revenue.&#160; The U.S. revenue
growth excluding OEM was 1.2 percent.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:28.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Europe/Middle-East/Africa
(EMEA) geographic revenue increased in the third quarter 6.4 percent (2.3
percent adjusted for currency) versus the same period in 2005.&#160; Performance across the geography improved
with increased revenue in all major countries. The U.K grew 10.9 percent (5.6
percent adjusted for currency), Italy 6.5 percent, (1.9 percent adjusted for
currency), France 6.1 percent, (1.5 percent adjusted for currency), Spain 9.1
percent (4.3 percent adjusted for currency) and Germany 3.2 percent (down 1.3
percent adjusted for currency)&#160; versus
the third quarter of 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:28.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the Asia
Pacific geography, revenue increased 4.2 percent (6.4 percent adjusted for
currency) versus the third quarter of 2005.&#160;
Double-digit revenue increases in China of 28.6 percent (27.2 percent
adjusted for currency), India 29.7 percent (36.7 percent adjusted for currency)
and Korea 19.6 percent (10.8 percent adjusted for currency) were partially
offset by decreased revenue in Japan of 5.6 percent (1.3 percent adjusted for
currency). Japan represents over half of the Asia Pacific revenue base and its
performance in the third quarter improved over that of prior quarters;
excluding OEM, revenue declined 5.0 percent (flat adjusted for currency).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">34</font></p>
</div><br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='34',FILE='C:\fc\3031881638_D12364_1442975\19062-7-ga.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 18:08 2006' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

<div>
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Revenue in the key
emerging countries of China, India, Brazil and Russia together grew 22.5
percent (19.4 percent adjusted for currency) versus the same period of
2005.&#160; India again had the strongest
growth at 29.7 percent (36.7 percent adjusted for currency), China grew 28.6
percent (27.2 percent adjusted for currency) and Brazil 20.8 percent (12.7
percent adjusted for currency). Revenue in Russia declined in the third
quarter&#160; 6.6 percent (6.6 percent
adjusted for currency).&#160; The company
continues to invest to build capabilities in these countries both to address
the fast-growing domestic market opportunities and to enhance its globally
integrated operations.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">OEM revenue
increased 24.3 percent (24.3 percent adjusted for currency) in the third
quarter of 2006 versus the same period of 2005, driven by strong game chip
performance in the company&#146;s Microelectronics business.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Revenue growth by
geography in the first nine months of 2006, when compared to the same period of
2005, was negatively impacted by the divestiture of the Personal Computing
business.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Americas
geographic revenue in the first nine months of 2006 increased 0.3 percent (down
0.9&#160; percent adjusted for currency)
versus the first nine month period of 2005.&#160;
Revenue increased in all regions with Latin America up 6.6 percent (flat
adjusted for currency), Canada increased 2.5 percent (down 5.1 percent adjusted
for currency) and the U.S. was up 2.0 percent driven by strong OEM revenue.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the EMEA
geography, revenue declined 4.0 percent (2.6 percent adjusted for currency) in
the first nine months of 2006 versus the same period in 2005.&#160; Revenue declined in Germany 7.0 percent (5.7
percent adjusted for currency), Italy 4.5 percent (3.1 percent adjusted for
currency) and the UK 3.5 percent (2.2 percent adjusted for currency), partially
offset by increases in France 0.4 percent (1.6 percent adjusted for currency)
and Spain 0.2 percent (1.5 percent adjusted for currency).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Revenue in the
Asia Pacific geography decreased 9.6 percent (5.8 percent adjusted for currency)
in the first nine months of 2006 versus the same period in 2005.&#160; Japan revenue declined 14.2 percent (7.7
percent adjusted for currency) and China was also down 7.2 percent (8.5 percent
adjusted for currency); partially offsetting these declines were revenue
increases in India of 19.1 percent (23.7 percent adjusted for currency) and
Korea of 13.0 percent (6.3 percent adjusted for currency).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Revenue in the key
emerging countries of China, India, Brazil and Russia together increased 5.7
percent (0.8 percent adjusted for currency) versus the same period of
2005.&#160; Growth in India 19.1 percent (23.7
percent adjusted for currency),&#160; Brazil
15.8 percent (2.4 percent adjusted for currency) and Russia 4.8 percent (4.8
percent adjusted for currency) was partially offset by lower revenue in China
7.2 percent (8.5 percent adjusted for currency).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">OEM revenue
increased 27.9 percent (28.0 percent adjusted for currency) in the first nine
months of 2006&#160; versus the same period in
2005, driven by strong game chip performance in the company&#146;s Microelectronics
business.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">35</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='35',FILE='C:\fc\303181316222_D12364_1442975\19062-7-gc.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 18:13 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Revenue Excluding
Personal Computing Business</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">

to conform with 2006 presentation.</p>

  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

  <td width="43%" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:43.62%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">For&nbsp;the&nbsp;nine&nbsp;months&nbsp;ended&nbsp;September&nbsp;30:</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.8</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Reclassified
to conform with 2006 presentation.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">**</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
majority of the company&#146;s enterprise business, which excludes the company&#146;s
original equipment manufacturer (OEM) technology business, occurs in industries
that are broadly grouped into six sectors around which&#160; the company&#146;s sales and distribution
activities, as well as an increasing number of its services and products
businesses are organized. The majority of the businesses in the Small &amp;
Medium category have fewer than 1,000 employees.</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">36</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="43%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:43.62%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 20.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Americas</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">

  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">

  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:10.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">65,166</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:10.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">63,831</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.1</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 2.25pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.9</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 2.25pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The discussion
below on sector and geographic revenues refers to the previous tables excluding
the Personal Computing business external revenue, in order to present the
company&#146;s results on a comparable basis year-to-year, and best present the
company&#146;s ongoing operational performance.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For the first nine
months of 2006, revenue increases in Small and Medium Business, the Financial
Services Sector and the Communications Sector were partially offset by declines
in the other industry sectors when compared to the same period in 2005.&#160; The Financial Services Sector revenue
increase was driven by Banking (7.4 percent) and was partially offset by
declines in Financial Markets (3.2 percent) and Insurance (1.2 percent).&#160;&#160; The decrease in Public Sector revenue was
driven by declines in Government (1.9 percent) and Education (15.5 percent),
partially offset by increased revenue in Health (4.7 percent).&#160; The Industrial Sector revenue decline was
driven by Automotive (3.9 percent) and Industrial Products (10.4 percent),
partially offset by increases in Chemical and Petroleum (12.2 percent).&#160; Distribution Sector revenue decreased driven
by Travel and Transportation (4.8 percent) and Retail (1.0 percent), partially
offset by increased revenue in Consumer Products (5.4 percent).&#160; Revenue increased in the Communications
Sector driven by Utilities (8.9 percent) and Telecommunications (1.4
percent).&#160; Revenue increases in Small and
Medium Business were experienced in all geographic markets led by growth in the
Americas (7.1 percent).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Geographic revenue
performance, presented below and in the table above, exclude OEM revenue, which
is presented separately.&#160;
Country-specific and regional growth rates include OEM revenue.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Revenue in the
Americas geography grew 4.3 percent (3.0 percent adjusted for currency) versus
the first nine months&#160; of&#160; 2005 with growth in all regions. Latin
America&#160; increased 14.9 percent (7.7
percent adjusted for currency), Canada was up 8.3 percent (0.3 percent adjusted
for currency) and the U.S. increased 5.4 percent driven by strong OEM revenue.
The U.S. revenue growth excluding OEM was 3.0 percent.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EMEA geographic
revenue was flat (up 1.4 percent adjusted for currency) in the first nine
months of 2006 versus 2005 with mixed results by country.&#160; France and Spain showed growth, 3.8 percent
(5.1 percent adjusted for currency) and 3.0 percent (4.4 percent adjusted for
currency), respectively, versus the prior year period. Revenue declined in
Germany 3.6 percent</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">37</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='37',FILE='C:\fc\303181316222_D12364_1442975\19062-7-gc.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 18:13 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2.3 percent adjusted for
currency), Italy 1.9 percent (0.6 percent adjusted for currency) and the UK 0.2
percent (up 1.1 percent adjusted for currency) versus the first nine months of
2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the Asia
Pacific geography, revenue decreased 3.4 percent (increased 0.7 percent
adjusted for currency) versus the first nine months of 2005.&#160; Japan revenue declined 11.0 percent (4.2
percent adjusted for currency).&#160;
Partially offsetting these declines were revenue increases in China 14.0
percent (12.4 percent adjusted for currency),&#160;
India 41.0 percent (46.4 percent adjusted for currency) and Korea 15.2
percent (8.4 percent adjusted for currency).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Revenue in the key
emerging countries of China, India, Brazil and Russia together grew 20.4
percent (14.9 percent adjusted for currency) versus the same period of 2005, as
the company continues to expand its capabilities in these countries. India
again had the strongest growth at 41.0 percent (46.4 percent adjusted for
currency), Brazil grew 20.9 percent (7.0 percent adjusted for currency), Russia
increased 14.1 percent (14.1 percent adjusted for currency) and China grew 14.0
percent (12.4 percent adjusted for currency).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Global Services
revenue increased 2.7 percent and 0.2 percent (1.6 percent and 1.3 percent
adjusted for currency) in the third quarter and first nine months of 2006,
respectively. In the third quarter, the revenue growth rate improved
sequentially in both Global Technology Services and Global Business Services.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Hardware revenue
increased&#160; 8.9 percent and 5.1 percent
(7.7 percent and 5.3 percent adjusted for currency) in the third quarter and
first nine months of 2006, respectively, compared to the same periods in
2005.&#160; The increase in Hardware revenue
was driven by strong performance in System z, while System p, Systems Storage
and Microelectronics also had good revenue growth in the third quarter of 2006.
These increases were partially offset by a decline in System i servers.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Software revenue
increased 8.5 percent and 5.2 percent (6.7 percent and 5.9 percent adjusted for
currency) in the third quarter and first nine months of 2006, respectively,
versus the same periods last year.&#160; The
revenue increase was driven by growth of 20.0 percent and 13.3 percent, respectively,
in the company&#146;s key branded middleware products, partially offset by decreases
in operating systems products of 6.1 percent and 7.9 percent, respectively.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">See pages 46 to 56
for additional information regarding Global Services, Hardware and Software
segment results.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Global Financing
revenue declined 1.5 percent and 2.6 percent (3.2 percent and 2.4 percent&#160; adjusted for currency) in the third quarter
and first nine months of 2005, respectively, versus the same periods in
2005.&#160; The declines were primarily driven
by a decrease in remarketing equipment sales.&#160;
See pages 64 to 71 for additional information regarding Global Financing
results.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">38</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='38',FILE='C:\fc\303181316222_D12364_1442975\19062-7-gc.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 18:13 2006' -->

  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">26.1</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.7</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:3.98%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;pts.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="55%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:55.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 20.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Hardware</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">37.7</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">37.1</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">0.6</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:3.98%;">

  </td>

  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">

  Margin:</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:3.98%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="55%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:55.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 20.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Global Services</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">27.4</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">25.5</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">

  </td>

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0.375pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">

  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0.375pt 0pt;width:3.98%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">38.6</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.2</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:3.98%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;pts.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The increase<b> </b>in the Global Services gross profit
margins was due primarily to the benefits from the company&#146;s productivity
initiatives and cost efficiencies, including improved utilization.&#160; The increase in Hardware gross profit margin
in the first nine months of 2006 was due to the sale of the Personal Computing
business (which had a lower gross profit margin than the other hardware
products) in the second quarter of 2005.&#160;
The Hardware margin declined without the benefits received from the sale
of the Personal Computing business (see page 53 for additional
information).&#160; The decrease in Global
Financing gross profit margins was driven</font> by declining financing margins primarily due to the changing
short-term interest rate environment.</p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Expense</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Total expense
and other income expense-to-revenue ratio increased&#160; 0.9 points and 0.6 points to 27.9 percent and
27.8 percent in the third quarter and first nine months of 2006,
respectively,&#160; versus the same periods of
2005.&#160; The increase in the
expense-to-revenue ratio in the third quarter was due to the 8.5 percent
increase in expense, partially offset by the 5.1 percent increase in revenue.
The increase in expense-to-revenue ratio in the first nine months was driven by
the 2.3 percent decrease in revenue, partially offset by a&#160; 0.1 percent decrease in expense.&#160; For additional information regarding Total
expense and other income, see the following analyses by category.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">39</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='39',FILE='C:\fc\303181316222_D12364_1442975\19062-7-gc.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 18:13 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 7.2pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-7.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Selling, general
and administrative expense</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="11%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(25</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(6</font></p>
  </td>

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">nm</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">nm</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>-
not meaningful</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Reclassified
to conform with 2006 presentation.</p>

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;">Change</font></b></p>

  </td>

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">nm</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>-
not meaningful</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Reclassified
to conform with 2006 presentation.</p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Total Selling,
general and administrative (SG&amp;A) expense increased 10.5 percent (9.3
percent adjusted for currency) and decreased 8.9 percent (8.5 percent adjusted
for currency), respectively, in the third quarter and first nine months of 2006
versus the same periods in 2005.&#160; The
increase in the third quarter of 2006 was primarily due to increased expense
associated with the company&#146;s ongoing investments in sales skills, emerging
markets and its strategic acquisitions.&#160;
The decrease in the first nine months of 2006 was primarily due to the
restructuring charges recorded in the second quarter of 2005.&#160; (See Note 5 on pages 10 through 12 for
additional information). In addition, stock-based compensation expense and
retirement-related expense declined in the first nine months of 2006 versus the
comparable period of 2005.&#160; (See Note 3
on pages 7 and 8 for additional information regarding stock-based compensation
expense and Note 6 on pages 13 to 16 for additional information regarding
retirement-related expense).</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">40</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='40',FILE='C:\fc\303181316222_D12364_1442975\19062-7-gc.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 18:13 2006' -->

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">75.9</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 2.25pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Reclassified
to conform with 2006 presentation.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">nm</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>-
not meaningful</p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 7.2pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-7.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>

 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="57%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:57.16%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 20.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Interest income</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Reclassified
to conform with 2006 presentation.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">nm</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>-
not meaningful</p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Other (income) and
expense was income of $174 million in the third quarter 2006 versus income of
$99 million in the third quarter of 2005.&#160;
Interest income increased $52 million in the third quarter of 2006
versus the same period in 2005 reflecting the company&#146;s higher cash balance and
increasing interest rates.&#160; Other
(income) and expense was income of $616 million in the first nine months of
2006 versus income of $1,788 million in the first nine months of 2005.&#160; The decrease year-to-year was primarily
driven by the gain associated with the sale of the Personal Computing business
to Lenovo on April 30, 2005.&#160; The pretax
gain recorded through the third-quarter 2005 associated with this transaction
was $1,112 million. (See Note 9 on page 19 for additional information).&#160; In addition, on June 30, 2005, the company
settled certain antitrust issues with the Microsoft Corporation and the gain
from this settlement was $775 million.&#160;
The Personal Computing business divestiture and Microsoft gain amounts
are reflected in the Other line in the nine month table above.&#160; The company also recorded real estate-related
restructuring charges of $235 million in the second quarter of 2005 (see Note 5
on pages 10 through&#160; 12 for additional
information). Interest income increased $220 million in the first nine</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">41</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">months of 2006 versus the
same period in 2005 reflecting the company&#146;s higher cash balance and increasing
interest rates.&#160; Impacts related to
foreign currency-transaction gains and losses and derivative instruments&#151;improved
$271 million in the first nine months of 2006 versus the same period last year.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Research, Development and
Engineering</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">For&nbsp;the&nbsp;nine&nbsp;months&nbsp;ended&nbsp;September&nbsp;30:</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="57%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:57.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Research,
  development and engineering</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:10.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4,520</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:10.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4,383</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.1</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr height="0">
  <td width="427" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="18" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="7" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="76" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="18" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="7" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="76" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="18" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="83" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="18" style="border:none;"></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The increase for
the third quarter and first nine months of 2006 was primarily due to increased
spending in the Systems and Technology Group ($34 million and $75 million), as
well as increased spending in Software ($62 million and $102 million),
partially offset by lower spending in the Personal Computing Division ($0
million and $48 million) as a result of the divestiture of that unit.&#160; In addition, retirement-related expense
increased $7 million and $24 million in the third quarter and first nine months
of 2006 versus the same periods of 2005, respectively, and stock-based
compensation expense declined $4 million and $18 million in the third quarter
and first nine months of 2006 versus the comparable periods in 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 7.2pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-7.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Intellectual
Property and Custom Development Income</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  Property and Custom Development Income:</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="57%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:57.14%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 20.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Sales and other transfers of intellectual property</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:10.12%;">

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font face="Times New Roman">42</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='42',FILE='C:\fc\303181316222_D12364_1442975\19062-7-gc.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Oct 30 18:13 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:25.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The timing and
amount of Sales and other transfers of IP may vary significantly from period to
period depending upon the timing of divestitures, economic conditions, industry
consolidation and the timing of new patents and know-how development.&#160; There were no significant IP transactions in
the third quarter or first nine months of 2006 and 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Interest Expense</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:11.12%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric ideograph-other;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;">Percent</font></b></p>
